Sentencas: We report laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy (LIBS) analysis of gadolinium (Gd) in gadolinium-doped ceria (GDC), the functional material used in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Univariate and multivariate analyses of Gd in gadolinia-doped ceria using laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy

Sentencas: LIBS using laser ablation to atomize solid samples is competent in sampling the refractory ceria.
Titulo: Univariate and multivariate analyses of Gd in gadolinia-doped ceria using laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy

Sentencas: Also, a few to 10 mol.% of Gd is doped in GDC to be used for SOFCs.
Titulo: Univariate and multivariate analyses of Gd in gadolinia-doped ceria using laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy

Sentencas: Such a high concentration requires additional dilution after acid digestion of the sample for conventional analyses.
Titulo: Univariate and multivariate analyses of Gd in gadolinia-doped ceria using laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy

Sentencas: LIBS with typical dynamic range from ppm to percent can analyze the high concentrations of Gd directly.
Titulo: Univariate and multivariate analyses of Gd in gadolinia-doped ceria using laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy

Sentencas: GDCs with 1-10 mol.% of Gd were synthesized by glycine-nitrate process and the LIBS spectra were recorded.
Titulo: Univariate and multivariate analyses of Gd in gadolinia-doped ceria using laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy

Sentencas: In spite of these advantages of LIBS, calibrating LIBS spectra to the concentrations of Gd is quite challenging due to rich emissions of Ce.
Titulo: Univariate and multivariate analyses of Gd in gadolinia-doped ceria using laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy

Sentencas: Six prominent Gd I lines were selected for univariate calibrations and the whole spectra were used for multivariate partial least squaresregression (PLS-R) modeling.
Titulo: Univariate and multivariate analyses of Gd in gadolinia-doped ceria using laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy

Sentencas: The PLS-R model considering emission intensities of both matrix and analyte elements outperformed the univariate calibrations.
Titulo: Univariate and multivariate analyses of Gd in gadolinia-doped ceria using laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy

Sentencas: Our results suggest that LIBS in combination with multivariate analysis can be useful as an analysis method for the refractory lanthanide oxide materials.
Titulo: Univariate and multivariate analyses of Gd in gadolinia-doped ceria using laser-induced breakdown spectroscopy
